verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Command <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> that they put out <S%H7971><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> the camp <S%H4264><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> leper, <S%H6879><s%> and every one <S%H3605><s%> that hath an issue, <S%H2100><s%> and whosoever <S%H3605><s%> is defiled <S%H2931><s%> by the dead: <S%H5315><s%>

Both male <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2145><s%> and <S%H5704><s%> female <S%H5347><s%> shall ye put out, <S%H7971><s%> without <S%H413><s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2351><s%> the camp <S%H4264><s%> shall ye put <S%H7971><s%> them; that they defile <S%H2930><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> <S%H853><s%> their camps, <S%H4264><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> whereof <S%H834><s%> I <S%H589><s%> dwell. <S%H7931><s%>

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> so, <S%H3651><s%> and put them out <S%H7971><s%> <S%H853><s%> without <S%H413><s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2351><s%> the camp: <S%H4264><s%> as <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> When <S%H3588><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> or <S%H176><s%> woman <S%H802><s%> shall commit <S%H6213><s%> any <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> sin <S%H2403><s%> that men <S%H120><s%> commit, to do <S%H4603><s%> a trespass <S%H4604><s%> against the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and that <S%H1931><s%> person <S%H5315><s%> be guilty; <S%H816><s%>

Then they shall confess <S%H3034><s%> <S%H853><s%> their sin <S%H2403><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they have done: <S%H6213><s%> and he shall recompense <S%H7725><s%> his <S%H853><s%> trespass <S%H817><s%> with the principal <S%H7218><s%> thereof, and add <S%H3254><s%> unto <S%H5921><s%> it the fifth <S%H2549><s%> part thereof, and give <S%H5414><s%> it unto him against whom <S%H834><s%> he hath trespassed. <S%H816><s%>

But if <S%H518><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> have no <S%H369><s%> kinsman <S%H1350><s%> to recompense <S%H7725><s%> the trespass <S%H817><s%> unto, <S%H413><s%> let the trespass <S%H817><s%> be recompensed <S%H7725><s%> unto the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> even to the priest; <S%H3548><s%> beside <S%H4480><s%> <S%H905><s%> the ram <S%H352><s%> of the atonement, <S%H3725><s%> whereby <S%H834><s%> an atonement shall be made <S%H3722><s%> for <S%H5921><s%> him.

And every <S%H3605><s%> offering <S%H8641><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the holy things <S%H6944><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they bring <S%H7126><s%> unto the priest, <S%H3548><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> his.

And every man's <S%H376><s%> <S%H853><s%> hallowed things <S%H6944><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> his: whatsoever <S%H834><s%> any man <S%H376><s%> giveth <S%H5414><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> it shall be <S%H1961><s%> his.
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, If <S%H3588><s%> any man's <S%H376><s%> <S%H376><s%> wife <S%H802><s%> go aside, <S%H7847><s%> and commit <S%H4603><s%> a trespass <S%H4604><s%> against him,

And a man <S%H376><s%> lie <S%H7901><s%> with <S%H854><s%> her carnally, <S%H7902><s%> <S%H2233><s%> and it be hid <S%H5956><s%> from the eyes <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5869><s%> of her husband, <S%H376><s%> and be kept close, <S%H5641><s%> and she <S%H1931><s%> be defiled, <S%H2930><s%> and there be no <S%H369><s%> witness <S%H5707><s%> against her, neither <S%H3808><s%> she <S%H1931><s%> be taken <S%H8610><s%> with the manner;

And the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of jealousy <S%H7068><s%> come <S%H5674><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> him, and he be jealous <S%H7065><s%> <S%H853><s%> of his wife, <S%H802><s%> and she <S%H1931><s%> be defiled: <S%H2930><s%> or <S%H176><s%> if the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of jealousy <S%H7068><s%> come <S%H5674><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> him, and he be jealous <S%H7065><s%> <S%H853><s%> of his wife, <S%H802><s%> and she <S%H1931><s%> be not <S%H3808><s%> defiled: <S%H2930><s%>

Then shall the man <S%H376><s%> bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H853><s%> his wife <S%H802><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> and he shall bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H853><s%> her offering <S%H7133><s%> for <S%H5921><s%> her, the tenth <S%H6224><s%> part of an ephah <S%H374><s%> of barley <S%H8184><s%> meal; <S%H7058><s%> he shall pour <S%H3332><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> it, nor <S%H3808><s%> put <S%H5414><s%> frankincense <S%H3828><s%> thereon; <S%H5921><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> is an offering <S%H4503><s%> of jealousy, <S%H7068><s%> an offering <S%H4503><s%> of memorial, <S%H2146><s%> bringing iniquity to remembrance. <S%H2142><s%> <S%H5771><s%>
And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall bring her near, <S%H7126><s%> <S%H853><s%> and set <S%H5975><s%> her before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%>

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall take <S%H3947><s%> holy <S%H6918><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> in an earthen <S%H2789><s%> vessel; <S%H3627><s%> and of <S%H4480><s%> the dust <S%H6083><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is <S%H1961><s%> in the floor <S%H7172><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall take, <S%H3947><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> it into <S%H413><s%> the water: <S%H4325><s%>

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall set <S%H5975><s%> <S%H853><s%> the woman <S%H802><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and uncover <S%H6544><s%> <S%H853><s%> the woman's <S%H802><s%> head, <S%H7218><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> the offering <S%H4503><s%> of memorial <S%H2146><s%> in <S%H5921><s%> her hands, <S%H3709><s%> which <S%H1931><s%> is the jealousy <S%H7068><s%> offering: <S%H4503><s%> and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall have <S%H1961><s%> in his hand <S%H3027><s%> the bitter <S%H4751><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> that causeth the curse: <S%H779><s%>

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall charge her by an oath, <S%H7650><s%> <S%H853><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the woman, <S%H802><s%> If <S%H518><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> man <S%H376><s%> have lain <S%H7901><s%> with <S%H854><s%> thee, and if <S%H518><s%> thou hast not <S%H3808><s%> gone aside <S%H7847><s%> to uncleanness <S%H2932><s%> with another instead of <S%H8478><s%> thy husband, <S%H376><s%> be thou free <S%H5352><s%> from this <S%H428><s%> bitter <S%H4751><s%> water <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4325><s%> that causeth the curse: <S%H779><s%>

But if <S%H3588><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> hast gone aside <S%H7847><s%> to another instead of <S%H8478><s%> thy husband, <S%H376><s%> and if <S%H3588><s%> thou be defiled, <S%H2930><s%> and some man <S%H376><s%> have lain <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H7903><s%> with thee beside <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1107><s%> thine husband: <S%H376><s%>

Then the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall charge <S%H7650><s%> <S%H853><s%> the woman <S%H802><s%> with an oath <S%H7621><s%> of cursing, <S%H423><s%> and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall say <S%H559><s%> unto the woman, <S%H802><s%> The LORD <S%H3068><s%> make <S%H5414><s%> thee a curse <S%H423><s%> and an oath <S%H7621><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> thy people, <S%H5971><s%> when the LORD <S%H3068><s%> doth make <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy thigh <S%H3409><s%> to rot, <S%H5307><s%> and thy belly <S%H990><s%> to swell; <S%H6639><s%>

And this <S%H428><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> that causeth the curse <S%H779><s%> shall go <S%H935><s%> into thy bowels, <S%H4578><s%> to make thy belly <S%H990><s%> to swell, <S%H6638><s%> and thy thigh <S%H3409><s%> to rot: <S%H5307><s%> And the woman <S%H802><s%> shall say, <S%H559><s%> Amen, <S%H543><s%> amen. <S%H543><s%>

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall write <S%H3789><s%> these <S%H428><s%> <S%H853><s%> curses <S%H423><s%> in a book, <S%H5612><s%> and he shall blot them out <S%H4229><s%> with <S%H413><s%> the bitter <S%H4751><s%> water: <S%H4325><s%>

And he shall cause <S%H853><s%> the woman <S%H802><s%> to drink <S%H8248><s%> <S%H853><s%> the bitter <S%H4751><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> that causeth the curse: <S%H779><s%> and the water <S%H4325><s%> that causeth the curse <S%H779><s%> shall enter <S%H935><s%> into her, and become bitter. <S%H4751><s%>

Then the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> the jealousy <S%H7068><s%> offering <S%H4503><s%> out of the woman's <S%H802><s%> hand, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3027><s%> and shall wave <S%H5130><s%> <S%H853><s%> the offering <S%H4503><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and offer <S%H7126><s%> it upon <S%H413><s%> the altar: <S%H4196><s%>

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall take a handful <S%H7061><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> the offering, <S%H4503><s%> even <S%H853><s%> the memorial <S%H234><s%> thereof, and burn <S%H6999><s%> it upon the altar, <S%H4196><s%> and afterward <S%H310><s%> shall cause <S%H853><s%> the woman <S%H802><s%> to drink <S%H8248><s%> <S%H853><s%> the water. <S%H4325><s%>

And when he hath made her to drink <S%H8248><s%> <S%H853><s%> the water, <S%H4325><s%> then it shall come to pass, <S%H1961><s%> that, if <S%H518><s%> she be defiled, <S%H2930><s%> and have done <S%H4603><s%> trespass <S%H4604><s%> against her husband, <S%H376><s%> that the water <S%H4325><s%> that causeth the curse <S%H779><s%> shall enter <S%H935><s%> into her, and become bitter, <S%H4751><s%> and her belly <S%H990><s%> shall swell, <S%H6638><s%> and her thigh <S%H3409><s%> shall rot: <S%H5307><s%> and the woman <S%H802><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> a curse <S%H423><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> her people. <S%H5971><s%>

And if <S%H518><s%> the woman <S%H802><s%> be not <S%H3808><s%> defiled, <S%H2930><s%> but be clean; <S%H2889><s%> then she shall be free, <S%H5352><s%> and shall conceive <S%H2232><s%> seed. <S%H2233><s%>

This <S%H2063><s%> is the law <S%H8451><s%> of jealousies, <S%H7068><s%> when <S%H834><s%> a wife <S%H802><s%> goeth aside <S%H7847><s%> to another instead of <S%H8478><s%> her husband, <S%H376><s%> and is defiled; <S%H2930><s%>

Or <S%H176><s%> when <S%H834><s%> the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of jealousy <S%H7068><s%> cometh <S%H5674><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> him, and he be jealous <S%H7065><s%> <S%H853><s%> over his wife, <S%H802><s%> and shall set <S%H5975><s%> <S%H853><s%> the woman <S%H802><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall execute <S%H6213><s%> upon her <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> law. <S%H8451><s%>

Then shall the man <S%H376><s%> be guiltless <S%H5352><s%> from iniquity, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5771><s%> and this <S%H1931><s%> woman <S%H802><s%> shall bear <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853><s%> her iniquity. <S%H5771><s%>
